ComicInfo.Title: Dance to the Murder; The Effigy!; Death of the Monster!
ComicInfo.Summary:
A criminal takes an effigy from a voodoo cult so that they cannot use it to compel him to surrender himself to the police.
Frankenstein is befriended by a primitive arctic tribe.
